description:
Are you planning to move to London?

Have you thought about hidden stones that are waiting for you?

London is the 6th expensive city in the world, which means living in London is too costly. But...London offers so many opportunities, job wise, education wise and self development wise. Also, starting a business in London is not that difficult. Any dream could come true here in the UK.


Only if... you learn how to budget wisely and how to save.

I've lived in the UK for 10 years now, and have gained a huge experience in surviving in London. So today I would like to share with you my survival guide. If you follow my advice pretty soon you will learn not only how to spend less in here, but also live almost for free!!

So, if London was your dream land, let's make it an opportunity land.

This course could be a great guide for you even if you've moved here already, so if you're new to London, a new Londoner :) join me for unmissable tips.

In this course you will learn with me the following:

  • - What to do when you first arrive to London
  • - Information about accommodation
  • - How to set up bank account
  • - Sign up for a NIN and GP, and what these are
  • - Pointers on how to save, how to look for a job
  • - Where to go, where to eat
  • - Initial budgeting, monthly budgeting
  • - Education, shopping and finding friends
  • - Secret tips from me personally

So, don't wait...grab your copy! See you on the other side :)
title: Secrets of Living and Working in London, the United Kingdom
